div.p: The MedicationDispense and MedicationDispenseDeclined profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a medication dispensing event.
The following example illustrates the use of the MedicationDispenseDeclined profile:

pre.code: define "Dementia Medications Not Dispensed": [ MedicationDispenseDeclined : "Dementia Medications"] MedicationDispenseDeclined where MedicationDispenseDeclined.statusReason in "Medical Reason" or MedicationDispenseDeclined.statusReason in "Patient Refusal"

div.p: For a more complete discussion of representation of negation within QICore and quality improvement artifacts, see the Negation in QI Core topic.

tr.td: Opthalmic Antihistamines not indicated; indicates that none of the drugs in the given not done value set were dispensed.
Alcaftadine 2.5 MG/ML Opthalmic Solution not indicated; indicates that the specific drug was not dispensed.
